queries.query:
from(bucket: "data")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "classifierResult")
    |> filter(
        fn: (r) =>
            r["_field"]
                ==
                "classificationDuration",
    )
    |> group(columns: ["jobId", "name", "params"])
    |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
    |> map(
        fn: (r) =>
            ({  r with
                _value: if r["class"] == r["predicted"] then 1.0 else 0.0,
                tmp: 1.0
            }),
    )
    |> cumulativeSum(columns: ["tmp", "_value"])
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: 100.0 * r._value / r.tmp}))
    |> drop(columns: ["tmp"])

from(bucket: "data")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "classifierResult")
    |> filter(
        fn: (r) =>
            r["_field"]
                ==
                "classificationDuration",
    )
    |> group(columns: ["jobId", "name", "params"])
    |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
    |> map(
        fn: (r) =>
            ({  r with
                _time: 1,
                _value: if r["class"] == r["predicted"] then 1.0 else 0.0,
                tmp: 1.0
            }),
    )
    |> cumulativeSum(columns: ["_time", "tmp", "_value"])
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: 100.0 * r._value / r.tmp}))
    |> drop(columns: ["tmp"])
    |> limit(n: 50000)

from(bucket: "data")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "classifierResult" and r["_field"] == "classificationDuration")
    |> map(
        fn: (r) =>
            ({
                _time: r._time,
                jobId: r.jobId,
                name: r.name,
                params: r.params,
                _value: if r["class"] == r["predicted"] then 1 else 0,
            }),
    )
    |> group(columns: ["jobId", "name", "params"])
    |> reduce(
        fn: (r, accumulator) =>
            ({
                count: accumulator.count + 1,
                total: accumulator.total + r._value,
                accuracy: float(v: accumulator.total + r._value) / float(v: accumulator.count + 1),
            }),
        identity: {count: 0, total: 0, accuracy: 0.0},
    )
    |> keep(columns: ["jobId", "name", "params", "accuracy"])
    |> group()
    |> sort(columns: ["accuracy"], desc: true)

from(bucket: "data")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "classifierResult" and r["_field"] == "classificationDuration")
    |> group(columns: ["jobId"])
    |> keep(columns: ["_time", "jobId"])
    |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
    |> limit(n: 1)
    |> group() //so it merges streams for each jobId into one stream
    |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: true)
    |> rename(columns: {"_time": "started"})
